thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 4 of 2268
thread.title: H Nye

author: H Nye
title: H Nye
text: This is the second consignment of multiple blinds I have ordered from Blings2Go and I'm really happy with the measure, quality and speed of delivery. The only downside was ordering on a 10% off everything offer, then 2 weeks later (before delivery) they advertise a 14% discount off everything - not a great way to keep customers happy thinking we've not got the best deal from you.
